item.description:
Douglas Hawkins will be giving a presentation on VM internals at the October JAVA Meetup. He will provide an overview of the internal workings of Sun's HotSpot virtual machine including Java byte code, garbage collection, and compile time and run time optimizations.

Doug is a software developer at Omgeo, a financial services company and has been programming Java professionally for the past six years.

Hope to see you there!


-John
item.name: The Boston Java October Meetup: VM Internals
